troparion: (Tone 1) Raise us up, O Lord,* from the abyss into which we have fallen;* bring back our hearts which have turned from You,* O God and the lover of mankind,* who brings together the ends of the earth.
prokimenon: I sought the Lord* and He answered me;
from all my terrors He set me free
I will bless the Lord at all times; His praise shall always be on my lips.
second_prokimenon: O Lord, plead my cause against my foes; fight those who fight me.
